Package design

Class SpriteManager

java.lang.Object
design.SpriteManager
public class SpriteManager extends Object
The SpriteManager class is responsible for managing and updating the sprite images for entities.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SpriteManager(EntitySprite entitySprite)
    Constructs a SpriteManager with the specified EntitySprite.
    SpriteManager(String spritePath)
    Constructs a SpriteManager with the specified sprite path.

    Method
    Description

    getSprite()
    Returns the ImageView containing the sprite image.
    void
    updateSprite(Direction direction)
    Updates the sprite image based on the specified direction.

  • Constructor Details

    • SpriteManager

      public SpriteManager(EntitySprite entitySprite)
      Constructs a SpriteManager with the specified EntitySprite.
      Parameters:
      entitySprite - The EntitySprite containing the paths for the sprite images.

    • SpriteManager

      public SpriteManager(String spritePath)
      Constructs a SpriteManager with the specified sprite path.
